    A wrapper for a socket factory which is needed because the LDAP framework has a stupid API.

    This exception indicates an attempt to access a name without permission
    SelectorThread
    The selector thread processes all data transfers with client connections.
    Server
    The SONAR server processes all data transfers with client connections.
    ServerNamespace
    A SONAR namespace is a mapping from all SONAR names to types, objects and attributes.
    TaskProcessor
    The task processor handles all SONAR tasks.
    TypeNode
    A type node represents the first-level nodes in the SONAR namespace.
